contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 29, 2014 D Kampf der Orchester (Battle of the Orchestras)
Kampf der Orchester (Battle of the Orchestras) 0 Entertainments Contest
kampf-der-orchester-battle-of-the-orchestras
None
Bodensee Arena, Kreuzlingen, TG, Switzerland TV-Entertainment Show/Competition from Swiss Television SRF.
There was a pre-selection (Casting) before finally 8 different Orchestras from different musical Styles and Parts of Switzerland qualified for the TV-Shows from Nov 16th, 22th and 29th. There's an App-Voting and a Telephone-Voting. Everytime the Orchestra with the least Number of Votes quits and in the final TV-Show the TOP6 will define the Winner.
Results other Finalists: Jason Boon Bigband (Zürich) - eliminated on Show from Nov 16th --- placed 8. Melodia Goldach (Wind Band, St. Gallen) - eliminated on Show from Nov 22th --- placed 7. Jugendmusik Kreuzlingen (Wind Band, Thurgau) --- 19.98% Final Voting, placed 2. Musikgesellschaft Matten (Wind Band, Bern) --- 17.48% Final Voting, placed 3. Swiss Powerbrass (diff. Styles, Nidwalden) --- 15.64% Final Voting, placed 4. Bieranjas (Blues, div., Nordwestschweiz) --- 9.98% Final Voting, placed 5.
Nov. 16, 2014, 8:51 p.m. Dec. 2, 2016, 8:26 a.m.
1 BML Talents Patrick Ottiger
6 Divert'in Brass Stéphane Pecorini
